name: Google - Fading elements
description: Hide Google's logo and self-advertising, only to bring it back on mouse hover.
additional_info:
This style is a great way -- If you're a Google loyalist -- to hide the elements you don't want to see all the time, yet want them to persist. This style hides:

> The Google logo above the searchbar
> The Google Chrome advert at the upper right
> The Google Nexus ad at the bottom of the search bar

On hover, these elements will fade in to be seen. It is done like this out of respect for Google's right to advertise, yet with that right they clutter the search page. Also a good way to hide doodles -- provided I have the right class for them. Update pending.
